pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Yesterday, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico.

The leaders discussed recent developments in the North America Free Trade Agreement negotiations and agreed to keep in close contact and continue working toward the early conclusion of a mutually beneficial agreement.

They also discussed their strong concerns about the recent initiation of a Section 232 investigation on automobile imports into the United States.
